description: Led a group of adventurers, including Aqua, Megumin, and Darkness, through numerous dangerous quests despite their incompetence, using strategy and wit.
highlights: Saved the Kingdom from annihilation using Aqua's divine powers and Megumin's explosive magic.

description: Guided a dangerous group of thieves and assassins through the most high-stakes missions, often challenging moral boundaries but achieving their goals with extreme efficiency.
highlights: Led the Troupe to victory in the Heavens Arena against rival factions.

description: Despite being part of a fake family, took charge of spy missions while keeping her family's secret intact. Utilized strength, secrecy, and charm to protect her 'family'.
highlights: Prevented international diplomatic disasters while maintaining family harmony.

description: Led an elite group of rogue ninjas aiming to control the world through the power of the tailed beasts. Despite their differing agendas, successfully united them under a single cause.
highlights: Defeated multiple Kage-level ninjas in battle.

description: Guided a group of outcasts, including Filo and Raphtalia, in battles against waves of monsters while clearing his name from false accusations and rising as the true hero.
highlights: Cleared his name from false allegations, earning the respect of the kingdom.

description: Led the gang through numerous conflicts and rivalries, shaping the group into one of the most influential in Tokyo despite constant challenges from rival factions.
highlights: Led the gang to control over Shibuya's streets
Prevented several major gang wars through strategy and leadership.

description: Led a group of knights known as the 'Seven Deadly Sins' to fight for justice and defeat the forces of evil, despite being branded as criminals.
highlights: Restored peace to the kingdom and resolved conflicts with former allies.

description: Guided a group of outcasts from the world of *Attack on Titan*, leading them to uncover hidden truths while fighting against both Titans and human oppressors.
highlights: Revealed the truth behind the Walls
Led successful operations against the Marleyan Empire.
